Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Arming circuit safety interlock fault. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 13/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh
